title: Drawing, "Company Crest, for Crane Co.", March 6, 1953
markings: Stamped in black ink, lower right: PRELIMINARY / HENRY DREYFUSS 969 SAN PASQUALE STREET, PASADENA 5, CAL. / 501 MADISON AVENUE, NEW YORK 22, N. Y. / CLIENT / TITLE / DATE / NUMBER.
signed: Signed in pencil, lower right: 3-6-53 / RS.
inscribed: Inscribed in white pastel, center: 100 YEARS OF QUALITY / CRANE CO. / 1854 – 1954. Inscribed in pencil, lower right: CRANE CO. / SEE DEEP CREST / 3/6/53 S - CR - 3.
dimensions: 31.7 x 31.6 cm (12 1/2 x 12 7/16 in.), slightly irregular

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Company Crest, for Crane Co.", March 6, 1953.
March 6, 1953. Crayon on off-white tracing paper. Gift of Henry Dreyfuss. 1972-88-339.
